trans-unit.source: Maintains a data model for the value of a property in the property grid.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce un modello di dati per il valore di una proprietà nella griglia delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> class with the parent property set to a specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> classe con la proprietà padre impostata su un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> that corresponds to this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> che corrisponde a questo <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> can be converted from a string.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un valore che indica se <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>può essere convertito da una stringa.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value can be converted from a string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il valore della proprietà può essere convertito da una stringa. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether exceptions thrown during property value getting and setting should be caught or should be propagated directly to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se le eccezioni generate durante il recupero e l'impostazione di valore della proprietà devono essere rilevate o devono essere propagate direttamente al chiamante.

trans-unit.source: This is based upon whether there are any subscribers to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException> event.
trans-unit.target: Basato sul se sono presenti dei sottoscrittori per il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException>evento.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if exceptions are caught; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if exceptions are propagated to the caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le eccezioni vengono intercettate; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se le eccezioni vengono propagate al chiamante.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, clears the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> so that it is unset.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, Cancella il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> in modo che venga annullata l'impostazione.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instances that correspond to items in a collection when <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*> verifies that the property is a collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> istanze che corrispondono agli elementi in una raccolta quando <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*>verifica che la proprietà è una raccolta.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> object that is a collection of property value instances.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"> </xref> oggetto che è una raccolta di istanze di valore di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*> to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, converte l'oggetto specificato <> </> *> per un <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to convert to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>valore da convertire in un <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>valore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, converte l'oggetto specificato <> </> *> per un <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> to convert to a string.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>per convertire una stringa.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> version of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Una <xref:System.String>versione di <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, restituisce un <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A property value <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Valore della proprietà <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the type of this property supports sub-properties.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un valore che indica se il tipo di questa proprietà supporta le sottoproprietà.

trans-unit.source: Typical implementations will use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> to verify whether sub-properties exist.
trans-unit.target: Modalità di implementazione tipiche utilizzerà un <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>per verificare l'esistenza di sottoproprietà.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the type supports sub-properties, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>che, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica che il tipo supporti sottoproprietà, in caso contrario <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> is a collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un valore che indica se questo <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> è una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the property value is a collection, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>che, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica che il valore della proprietà è una raccolta, in caso contrario <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> is the default value for the property.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>è il valore predefinito per la proprietà.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the value is the default, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>che, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica che il valore è l'impostazione predefinita, in caso contrario <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether multiple objects contain this property and have different values.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un valore che indica se più oggetti contengano questa proprietà e hanno valori diversi.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Boolean.True>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A> will return null and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A> will return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Boolean.True>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A>verrà restituito null e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A>restituiranno <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that multiple objects contain this property, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>che, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica che più oggetti contengano questa proprietà, in caso contrario <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.RootValueChanged"></xref> event when the underlying value type is changed externally, as on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.RootValueChanged"> </xref> eventi quando il tipo di valore sottostante è stato modificato esternamente, come nell'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.SubPropertyChanged"></xref> event when one of the sub-properties of this property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.SubPropertyChanged"> </xref> evento quando una delle sottoproprietà di questa proprietà viene modificato.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event with the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs> objects.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"> </xref> evento con l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>oggetti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs> object that provides the name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>oggetto che fornisce il nome della proprietà modificata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event that uses the name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"> </xref> evento che utilizza il nome della proprietà modificata.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà modificata.

trans-unit.source: Default implementation that raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"></xref> event when <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> properties experience failure getting or setting values in the underlying collection of data.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione predefinita che genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"> </xref> evento quando <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> proprietà non riescono a ottenere o impostare i valori nella raccolta di dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"></xref> that provides information about the get or set failure that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> che fornisce informazioni su get o set di errori che si è verificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> when the property implementation occurs in a host environment.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> quando l'implementazione della proprietà si verifica in un ambiente host.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object that represents the parent property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta la proprietà padre.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when properties or sub-properties of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando le proprietà o sottoproprietà del <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> oggetto è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Event used by host implementations for error handling.
trans-unit.target: Evento utilizzato dalle implementazioni host per la gestione degli errori.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> or <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*> property is updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> value being changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <> </> *> o <> </> *> proprietà viene aggiornata in seguito al <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> valore viene modificato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sets the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, imposta <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The object to be set in the underlying collection of data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da impostare nella raccolta di dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains information about where this property value is coming from.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene un <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"> </xref> oggetto che contiene informazioni su dove proviene questo valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains property value source information.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"> </xref> oggetto che contiene informazioni sull'origine di valore di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>come un <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> version of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Una <xref:System.String>versione di <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of sub-properties as <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, ottiene una raccolta di sottoproprietà come <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> istanze.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection"></xref> of instances.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection"> </xref> di istanze.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when sub-properties are updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> being changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando vengono aggiornate le sottoproprietà come risultato del <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> da modificare.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, throws an exception if verification of the specified value object shows it to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, genera un'eccezione se viene illustrata la verifica dell'oggetto valore specificato sia valido.

trans-unit.source: The object whose value is verified.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto il cui valore viene verificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property value in the underlying collection of property data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore della proprietà nella raccolta sottostante di dati della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A property value <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Valore della proprietà <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>
